question: What is corresponding latex code for the formula in the image?
choices: \int_{-\epsilon}^\infty dl\: {\rm e}^{-l\zeta}	\int_{-\epsilon}^\infty dl' {\rm e}^{-l'\zeta}	ll'{l'-l \over l+l'} \{3\,\delta''(l) - {3 \over 4}t\,\delta(l) \} =0.
\int_{-\epsilon}^\infty dl\: {\rm e}^{-l'\zeta} \int_{-\epsilon}^\infty dl' {\rm e}^{-l'\zeta} ll'{l'-l \over l+l'} \{3\,\delta''(l) - {3 \over 2}t\,\delta(l) \} =0.
\int_{-\epsilon}^\infty dl\: {\rm e}^{-l\zeta}	\int_{-\epsilon}^\infty dl' {\rm e}^{-l'\zeta}	ll'{l'-l \over l+l'} \{3\,\delta''(l) - {1 \over 4}t\,\delta(l) \} =0.
\int_{-\epsilon}^\infty dl\: {\rm e}^{-l\zeta}	\int_{-\epsilon}^\infty dl' {\rm e}^{-l'\zeta}	ll'{l'-l \over l+l'} \{2\,\delta''(l) - {3 \over 4}t\,\delta(l) \} =0.
